name: Exped Downmat Lite 5 Pump Sleeping Pad - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description: For those who crave a warm, spacious bed at the end of an adventurous day. The insulation in the Downmat Lite Pad is more compact an lighter than a foam-filled, self-inflating pad. To keep you centred as you sleep, it has baffled channels and air-filled pods around the perimeter.Outer 75-denier fabric is durable and stands up to rough ground.650-fill duck down insulation provides 3-season warmth.Welded-through baffles add stability and reduce cold spots.Large, air-only outer cells keep you from rolling out of bed.Valve eliminates moisture build-up caused by inflating mats with your breath.Includes stuff sack, repair kit, and mini-pump.
